sn22.137:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, you should abandon desire for whatever is impermanent. And what is impermanent?sn.iii.78Form is impermanent; you should abandon desire for it. Feeling … Perception … Volitional formations … Consciousness is impermanent; you should abandon desire for it. Bhikkhus, you should abandon desire for whatever is impermanent."
